infos.value: Tzztztzt...
So that's his long-distance listening device...
What is it now?
Heh heh. They went to Anvil Castle, did they?
Whispering with your friends again?
What'd they want from you this time, aye?
They say th' captured Leonis soldiers rebelled against th' guards.
Oh? They still had some fight in them, did they?
And? What happened then, aye?
Word is they went to Anvil Castle.
Huh. So your soldiers were all defeated? What a sorry lot.
Within expectations.
No need to act all tough.
Who's actin'? I wanted 'em to go to Anvil Castle.
Th' two of yer should head that way, too.
Us? Why should we go to the trouble...?
Yeah, what he said, aye!
Helena is going to be th' key here. Yer can't go hurting her. But...
As for the rest of 'em...do whatever yer like.
Wasn't Sir Owe one of the captured Leonis soldiers?
Did you say Owe!?
You're saying we can do whatever we want to Sir Owe!?
Yer heard me. There's just one more condition...
If either of yer find something, anything, report back to me. Got that?
Now get a move on!
